main_prompt: Describe Something You Do That Can Help You Concentrate On Work/Study
followup_3: How did you learn about it?
followup_4: How does it help you concentrate?

main_prompt: Describe a challenge you faced that you thought was rather difficult
followup_2: When and where you faced it
followup_3: Why you thought it was a difficult challenge
followup_4: And explain how you felt at the time

main_prompt: Describe something that surprised you and made you happy
followup_3: How you found out about it and what you did?
followup_4: And explain why it surprised you and made you happy.

main_prompt: Describe a place with a lot of trees that you would like to visit (e.g. a forest, oasis)
followup_2: Why you want to visit it?
followup_3: What activities you plan to do there?
followup_4: And explain how you think it will make you feel.

main_prompt: Describe A Friend You Like To Talk With
followup_2: What would you like to talk about?
followup_3: Why do you like to talk with him/her?
followup_4: How you feel about him/her?

main_prompt: Describe a city that is very interesting.
followup_3: How do you know about it?
followup_4: Why is it interesting?

main_prompt: Describe a public facility( for example a museum or a library ) that been renovated and improved recently
followup_2: When it was renovated and improved?
followup_3: What has been renovated and improved?
followup_4: And explain how you feel about it.

main_prompt: Describe A Skill That You Can Teach Other People
followup_3: How can you teach others this skill?
followup_4: How do you feel about this skill?

main_prompt: Describe a place you visited where the air was polluted
followup_3: Why the air was not good?
followup_4: And explain how you felt about the place.

main_prompt: Describe a person from a different cultural background with whom you enjoy spending time
followup_3: What activities you do together?
followup_4: And explain how this experience impacted you.

main_prompt: Describe An Interesting Neighbour
followup_1: How long have you known this neighbour?
followup_2: What do you think of your neighbour?
followup_3: Do you hang out with your neighbour often?
followup_4: What kind of relationship do you have with your neighbour?

main_prompt: Describe a time that something changed your life in good ways
followup_3: How you felt about it?
followup_4: And explain how it changed your life in good ways.

main_prompt: Describe a public park or garden.
followup_3: How often do you go there
followup_4: What you often do there and explain how you feel about it

main_prompt: Describe a person you only met once and want to know more about.
followup_3: Why do you want to know more about him/her?
followup_4: How did this encounter affect you?

main_prompt: Describe an old person you know who has had an interesting life
followup_3: What he/she has done in his/her life?
followup_4: And explain how you feel about him/her.

main_prompt: Describe a person who helps to protect the environment
followup_3: How they inspire others?
followup_4: And explain why you admire them.

main_prompt: Describe A Person Who You Believe Dresses Well
followup_1: Who is the person who dresses well?
followup_2: What kind of dresses does he/she like to wear?
followup_3: How do you know him/her?
followup_4: Why do you think they dress well?

main_prompt: Describe a place in a village that you visited.
followup_3: What did you do there?
followup_4: How did you feel?

main_prompt: Describe a person from whom others like to ask for advice
followup_2: Why people like to ask for his/her advice
followup_3: What kind of advice he/she often gives
followup_4: And explain how you feel about the person

main_prompt: Describe A Line Or A Few Words That You Remember From A Poem Or Song
followup_2: Where do you remember it from?
followup_3: Why is it significant for you?
followup_4: How does it make you feel?

main_prompt: Describe a time you used your cellphone/smartphone to do something important
followup_3: How important the cellphone/smartphone was?
followup_4: And explain how you felt about the experience.

main_prompt: Describe a person who inspired you to do something interesting.
followup_2: What they inspired you to do?
followup_3: How they inspired you?
followup_4: How you feel?

main_prompt: Describe a daily routine that you enjoy
followup_2: Where and when you do it?
followup_3: Who do you do it with?
followup_4: Explain why you enjoy it?
